what: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
text: NOTE: package used internal purposes moment.

title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
text: Helper Package Recalculating Effect Sizes Meta-Analyses.

title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
text: Meta-Analyses quantify combine effects published scientific literature. Different ways exist calculate effect size (uncertainty) single scientific study. packages provides various effect size calculation methods group differences.

title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
text: Install metapp GitHub:

title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
code: library(metapp)  # calculate a SMD with Hedges correction for small sample bias smd(x1 = 5, x2 = 7, sd1 = 2, sd2 = 3, n1 = 20, n2 = 18) #>           es       var #> 1 -0.7763268 0.1134856

what: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
title: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
text: Calculates confidence interval

title: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
text: es data frame class mpp effect size variance. example, output md, smd, smcr, ppc. level confidence level. Defaults 0.95. df degrees freedom. Defaults NA, assumes normal distribution. Otherwise t-distribution assumed.

title: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
text: data.frame effect size (es), variance (var) lower upper limits confidence interval (ci_low, ci_high).

title: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
code: # calculate a SMD first g <- smd(x1 = 10, x2 = 15, sd1 = 3, sd2 = 4, n1 = 11, n2 = 9)  # calculate confidence interval get_ci(g) #>          es       var   ci_low    ci_high #> 1 -1.375888 0.2493469 -2.35459 -0.3971872

what: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
title: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
text: Calculates Hedges correction factor small sample bias

title: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
text: x numeric, degrees freedom. exact Whether use exact formula approximation. Defaults true.

title: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
text: numeric, bias correction factor.

title: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
Calculating a mean difference — md
text: Calculates raw MD effect size simple group comparison.

title: Calculating a mean difference — md
code: md(x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2, var_homo = FALSE)

title: Calculating a mean difference — md
text: x1, x2 means first seconds group. sd1, sd2 standard deviations first second group. n1, n2 sample sizes first second group. var_homo whether variance estimator pooled standard deviation used, assumes homoscedasticity population variance (defaults FALSE).

title: Calculating a mean difference — md
text: data frame class mpp effect size (es) variance (var).

title: Calculating a mean difference — md
Pool groups — pool_groups
text: Pools mean, standard deviation sample size two groups.

title: Pool groups — pool_groups
code: pool_groups(x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2)

title: Pool groups — pool_groups
text: x1, x2 means first seconds group. sd1, sd2 standard deviations first second group. n1, n2 sample sizes first second group.

title: Pool groups — pool_groups
text: data frame group mean (mean), standard deviation (sd) sample size (n).

title: Pool groups — pool_groups

what: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — ppc
title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — ppc
text: Calculates standardized change score group comparison pre-post designs raw score based standardization (see Morris 2008).

title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — ppc
code: ppc(   x1d,   x2d,   sd1pre,   sd2pre,   n1,   n2,   r = NA,   r1 = NA,   r2 = NA,   type = 2,   var_becker = FALSE )

title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — ppc
text: x1d, x2d mean changes first second group sd1pre, sd2pre pre-score standard deviations first second group n1, n2 sample sizes first second group. r1, r2, r pre-post correlation first second group (type=1), groups (type=2). type Type effect size, see Morris (2008). (1) difference standardized mean changes group, (2) standardization using pooled pre sd. Defaults 2. var_becker type=1, whether approximate variance estimator Becker (1988) used (calculating variances group adding ). Otherwise uses variance estimation Morris (2008, Typ ppc1). See Morris 2000 comparison. Defaults FALSE.

title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — ppc
text: data frame class mpp effect size (es) variance (var).

title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — ppc

what: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
title: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
text: Calculates change score standard deviation group pre post standard deviations pre-post correlation.

title: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
text: sd_pre, sd_post pre post standard deviations. r pre-post correlation.

title: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
text: numeric, standard deviation change scores.

title: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
Calculate average standard deviation — sd_avg
text: Averages standard deviations two groups (square root average variance).

title: Calculate average standard deviation — sd_avg
Calculate average standard deviation — sd_avg
text: sd1, sd2 standard deviations first second group.

title: Calculate average standard deviation — sd_avg
text: average standard deviation

title: Calculate average standard deviation — sd_avg
Calculate pooled standard deviation — sd_pooled
text: Pools standard deviation two groups

title: Calculate pooled standard deviation — sd_pooled
code: sd_pooled(sd1, sd2, n1, n2, mle = FALSE)

title: Calculate pooled standard deviation — sd_pooled
text: sd1, sd2 standard deviations first second group. n1, n2 sample sizes first second group. mle Whether maximum likelihood estimator used, N instead df (N-2) denominator. See example McGrath & Mayer (2006). Defaults FALSE.

title: Calculate pooled standard deviation — sd_pooled
text: pooled standard deviation

title: Calculate pooled standard deviation — sd_pooled

what: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
title: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
text: Calculates pre-post correlation group pre, post change score standard deviation.

title: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
text: sd_pre, sd_post pre post standard deviations. sd_d standard deviation change scores

title: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
text: numeric, pre-post correlation.

title: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r

what: Calculating a standardized change score (raw score based standardization) — smcr
title: Calculating a standardized change score (raw score based standardization) — smcr
text: Calculates standardized change score raw score standardization single group.

title: Calculating a standardized change score (raw score based standardization) — smcr
code: smcr(xpre, xpost, sdpre, sdpost, n, r, hedges = TRUE, exact = TRUE)

title: Calculating a standardized change score (raw score based standardization) — smcr
text: xpre, xpost mean pre post score sdpre, sdpost standard deviation pre post score n sample size r pre-post correlation hedges whether bias correction small sample sizes according Hedges applied (defaults TRUE). exact whether use exact formula small sample size correction (otherwise approximation used). relevant hedges=TRUE. Defaults TRUE.

title: Calculating a standardized change score (raw score based standardization) — smcr
text: Uses average standard deviations pre post scores standardizer. Uses variance estimator Borenstein & Hedges (2019), Eq. 11.26.

title: Calculating a standardized change score (raw score based standardization) — smcr

what: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
text: Calculates SMD effect size simple group comparison.

title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
code: smd(   x1,   x2,   sd1,   sd2,   n1,   n2,   hedges = TRUE,   homo = TRUE,   vartype = 1,   exact = TRUE )

title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
text: x1, x2 means first seconds group. sd1, sd2 standard deviations first second group. n1, n2 sample sizes first second group. hedges whether bias correction small sample sizes according Hedges applied (defaults TRUE). homo whether pooled sd used standardizer (assuming homogeneous population variances). Defaults TRUE. vartype whether use variance estimator proposed Hedges (1, default metafor), variance estimator Borenstein (2), default RevMan (3)). Defaults 1. exact whether use exact formula small sample size correction (otherwise approximation used). relevant hedges=TRUE. Defaults TRUE.

title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
text: data frame class mpp effect size (es) variance (var).

title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
metapp 0.0.2 (2025-02-12)
text: New smcr() function standardized change scores raw score standardization single group Renamed smc() ppc() New helper functions sd_pooled() sd_avg() calculating pooled average standard deviation. md() now var_homo = FALSE new default (similar metafor RevMan)

title: metapp 0.0.1 (2025-01-31)
text: First development release
